Key:
Oooh, they're going at it!
Just when Tohka-chan's out there, too!
It was the right choice to choose tennis, huh Itsuka!

Ah maaan!
Tohka-chan's super cute!!
Tonomachi, you're ditching in order to be here, so cheer properly.
Hrngh!

Tohka... For someone who claims not to be good at
tennis, she's doing pretty well.

(Tohka's reflexes are amazing, so I suppose
it makes sense.)
Hah!
Deuce!

Huh? Tohka-chan's caught up!
I'm kinda getting really excited!
It looks like she's slowly learning the ropes.
Kyaaa! Tohka-chwaaaan! You're amaziiiiing!

(Can't Tonomachi cheer more normally...?
Jeez, this guy...)
(Still... I wonder why. Tohka's really dazzling for some reason.)

(Tohka's so dignified and beautiful while earnestly chasing the ball...
It's not an exaggeration to say it's like a work of art.)
――Huh, if it isn't Tonomachi-kun and Itsuka-kun?
Y-Yeah. Are you here to cheer Tohka on too?

Huh, the two of you cheering together so chummy and such,
is that rumor about you going out with Tonomachi-kun true?
That's so gross.

Hey! Don't spread weird rumors like that!
Where the hell did that information come from!?
I won't deny anything.
No, deny it!

――Oh, wait a second!
Then what would happen to Tohka!?

It would be too cruel of an outcome for her to have
her lover stolen by the dual-wielding Tonomachi-kun.
No, if she got rid of one of them, the ending could still be changed...

In any case, you're pretending to be sick, so shouldn't
you not be cheering at a time like this?

Hm? Wait, what? What do you mean?
Is it spring? Has spring finally come for me...?

Why don't you leave cheering Tohka-chan to Itsuka-kun,
and come to the back of the school building with us?

Ohhh!? So finally, my time to be popular has arrived!
Ha ha ha, I'm getting embarrassed!
It looks like this guy wants the "method" where no bones'll remain.
Hm? That's a pretty aggressive method of courting.
Whatever, just shut up and follow us.
Right right! See ya Itsuka! I'll be gone for a bit!

(Tonomachi...I hope you're happy until the very end.
I won't recover your bones.)

Itsuka-kun...if you take your eyes off Tohka-chan for even a second,
you won't get off with just being paraded around the city, you got it?

If you betray Tohka-chan, you will definitely be crucified
and tortured, alright?

When it comes to that, we won't kill you easily.
To start things off, we'll prepare a triangle stool and an iron maiden.
That's how it is, so cheer Tohka-chan on!
R-Right...
(Umm...yeah! Just gonna get back into things and cheer!)

(Huh? Tohka's suddenly got the advantage!
...Which means, if she gets one more point, she can turn it around?)

(Just one more ball, if a weak ball comes that's the chance, but...
Wait, just as I was saying it, an easy ball!?)

(――A ball with the best trajectory is heading
where Tohka is waiting!)
TohkaAA!! GOOOOOOOOO!!!!
Teeei!!
O-Out...!?

Hmm...?
Was I not supposed to knock it far upwards in this instance?
I saw it somewhere once before, but...
I-It would have been better for Tohka to do softball...
